# MTLTessellationPartitionMode.fractionalEven

**Case**

A fractional even partitioning mode.

## Declaration

```swift
case fractionalEven
```

## Partition modes

- **MTLTessellationPartitionMode.pow2**: A power of two partitioning mode.
- **MTLTessellationPartitionMode.integer**: An integer partitioning mode.
- **MTLTessellationPartitionMode.fractionalOdd**: A fractional odd partitioning mode.

items.description: A power of two partitioning mode.
